name: Bomb
description: Attackers must plant a defuser on one of two bomb sites. Defenders must prevent planting or counter-defuse within 45 seconds.

name: Secure Area
description: Attackers must locate and hold a room with a biohazard container for 10 consecutive seconds. Defenders must prevent the area from being secured.

name: Hostage
description: Attackers must safely extract the hostage to the extraction point. Defenders must prevent the rescue while keeping the hostage alive.
